Federal Register: EPA is adding 21 chemicals and 2 chemical categories to the list of toxic chemicals under section 313 of the Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know act of 1986 (EPCRA).  All of these chemicals and chemical categories appear on the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA) list of Hazardous wastes at 40 CFR 261.33(f). The addition of these chemical and chemical categories to the EPCRA section 313 list of toxic chemicals is based on their acute human health effects, carcinogenicity or other chronic human health effects, or their environmental effects, and on evidence that each is manufactured or imported in quantities of at least 10,000 pounds per year by at least one facility
